attributes.name: Makeup 360
attributes.steps:
Project Setup: Create Git repository and define project structure
Backend Setup: Develop Express.js application, set up API routes
Database Design: Design and implement database schema
attributes.description: Makeup 360 is an all-inclusive task management application designed to optimize team collaboration and productivity.
attributes.features:
User registration and login
Create, assign, update, and track tasks
Real-time collaboration and updates
Priority-based task categorization
attributes.interactions:
User logs in to Makeup 360 account.
Dashboard displays tasks by priority: High, Medium, Low.
User adds a task, assigns it, and sets a due date.
Task appears under the respective priority category.
Assigned user starts task, status updates in real-time.
Upon completion, task is marked as done and updates for all.
attributes.tagline: Browse the most stunning makeup looks
